Room.Name: Roland's Fighting Academy Training Room
Room.ShortDescription: You have successfully defeated the blue knight and are worthy to advance.
Room.LongDescription: Only the bravest and most powerful knights may advance through the Roland Royal Fighting Academy, and you have earned your rank of Punisher, Second Class. This vial of holy water will help you recover some of the dammage you sustained in battle. Good luck in your adventures and return here when you are ready for your final lesson.
